attributes.action: Stop ALL Supermarkets/Shops giving out Plastic Carrier Bags and replace them immediately with biodegradeable RECYCLED PAPER, Paper Bags. Also to STOP Local Councils giving out Black Plastic Bags at times like Christmas when the waste collections have stopped temporarily and for them to give recycled paper equivalents instead.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
